pages.title: Schematics
pages.text: Runestones are small slabs of stone with magical properties. They can hold different kinds of magical spells. The most common are the Traveling stones, used to travel to other locations.

pages.title: Market Traveling Stone
pages.text: You can ask a dwarf you are friends with to activate an inactive rune stone. When activated it can be used to teleport to a secret location only known by the dwarves and those they trust.

pages.title: Dwarven Market
pages.text: At the dwarven market you can trade for all kinds of items.
This dwarf will trade for all kinds of culinairy items.
This dwarf will trade for all kinds of farm animal items.
This dwarf will trade for all kinds of armour, weapons and tools.
This dwarf will trade for all kinds of artifects and trinkets.
This dwarf will trade for all kinds of stones and ore.
This dwarf will trade for all kinds of monster drops.
